Projects

Embark on a design journey that surpasses pixels, entering a realm of imagination. Explore my projects portfolio, where passion and creativity converge to shape enthralling visual narratives.

Project 1
Acceleration Of Machine Learning Models

Go to the project

Description

Machine Learning models deployement on FPGA-based SoC platforms, enabling both software-only and hybrid software/hardware inference. Desing of hardware accelerators using AMBA 5 AXI to optimize data transfer and system performance, achieving up to 60% reduction in inference time compared to software-only execution.

Role

Implemented FPGA hardware accelerators for Decision Tree, Linear Regression, and SVM models.
Automated ML model deployment and optimized SoC performance through AMBA 5 AXI integration.
Evaluated and optimized inference latency and computational speed on embedded systems.

Project 2
Epileptic Seizure Detection Helmet

Go to the project

Description

Wearable IoT embedded system integrating ECG (heart signals), EEG (brain signals), and SpOâ‚‚ (blood oxygenation) sensors to collect synchronized physiological signals for deep learning based epileptic seizure detection. Development of embedded software for real-time multi-sensor data acquisition and signal preprocessing, and evaluated deep learning classifiers using open-source and user-collected biosignal datasets.

Role

Designed the wearable embedded hardware and integrated ECG, EEG, and SpOâ‚‚ sensors.
Developed real-time embedded software on STM32 for synchronized data acquisition and preprocessing under timing constraints.
Trained and evaluated deep learning models on open-source and 10 user biosignal datasets to assess seizure detection performance.
